post_text: March 23, 2017 at 12:23â€¯PM#1Hi,I'm trying to do a macro for the selected executor starting with the line:Select @If I do a single line macro it works perfectly (it works if I press any off the executor buttons) but if I add a line more it only works if, after executing the macro, I press the "Mini Executor Dialog".Am I missing something?
